message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  Let's settle this quickly so the value doesn't diminish.
Your split seems a bit unfair to me. I'm willing to accept a slightly smaller share, but let's meet in the middle. How about this?
Bob, time is literally money in this game.  I'm willing to compromise slightly from my initial offer, but we need to settle this now before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, I understand the time pressure here, but I'm also trying to be reasonable. This offer is a fair compromise, especially with the inflation working against you.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I will be forced to be even less generous in the next round. The clock is ticking!
